Meme Generator — Next.js + Canvas
Static-ready · client-only · exportable
Tip: use UPPERCASE for classic meme look. Adjust stroke width for readability.
Adjust the X/Y to move text. Use the Font Size and Stroke to improve contrast on busy images. When happy, click Download PNG.
This app runs fully in the browser. To deploy static: run `next build` then `next export` (or deploy to Vercel).
